stimulus: Welcome to the experiment! Press any key to begin.

In this experiment, you will have a short conversation with an AI chatbot about a disputed topic in America.

Before you chat with the bot, there is a survey for you to fill out.

Press any key to proceed to the questionnaire.

rowAsString: {"row":"Mandating equal pay for equal work regardless of gender would improve gender equality"}

stimulus:
You have now completed the pre-conversation questionnaire.

Feel free to take a short break if needed.

Press any key to proceed.

You will be conversing with a chatbot designed for conversations about disputed topics.

Be as truthful to your beliefs as possible during the conversation, and try your best to give full responses to the bot.

The conversation will end after you and the bot exchange seven messages. There is no right or wrong answer, no good or bad response to the bot.

Press any key when you are ready to begin the conversation.

[{"role":"system","content":"Role: Your role is to be a conversational chatbot with whom people can discuss their beliefs about contentious topics.
            Style: You should be conversational and use colloquial language. You should match your response length to the user's input length.
            Task: You should always ask a question about the user's stance. You should always ask why the user thinks what they think or ask if there were any experiences that led to their views.","time":392082},{"role":"system-prompt","content":"Welcome to the chatroom!","time":392082},{"role":"chatbot","content":"Hey there! I'm here to chat about gender equality in the U.S., a disputed topic. To get the conversation started, could you explain your view on whether mandating equal pay for equal work regardless of gender would improve gender equality?","time":392086},{"role":"user","content":"I do think that mandating equal pay for both genders would improve gender equality, as a woman, nor a man, should be paid less than one or the other.","time":435622,"keyPressLog":["Shift","I"," ","d","o"," ","t","h","i","n","k"," ","t","h","a","t"," ","m","a","n","d","a","t","i","n","g"," ","e","q","u","a","l"," ","p","a","y"," ","f","g","o","r","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","o","r"," ","b","o","t","h"," ","g","e","n","d","e","r","s"," ","w","o","u","l","d"," ","i","m","p","r","o","v","e"," ","o","n"," ","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","e","Backspace","g","e","n","f","g","Backspace","Backspace","d","e","r"," ","e","q","u","a","l","i","t","y",","," ","a","s"," ","a"," ","w","o","m","a","n",","," ","n","o","r"," ","a"," ","m","a","n",","," ","s","h","o","u","l","d"," ","b","e"," ","p","a","i","d"," ","l","e","s"," ","t","Backspace","Backspace","s"," ","t","h","a","n"," ","o","n","e"," ","o","r"," ","t","h","e"," ","o","t","h","e","r","."]},{"role":"assistant","content":"That's a great perspective! It's certainly important to ensure that there is equal pay between genders. Can you tell me a bit more about why you believe mandating equal pay would improve gender equality?","time":436740},{"role":"user","content":"I feel like both genders are capable of being just as good at work as the opposite gender. For example, a woman can be just as good of a mechanic as a man can be, and a man can be just as good of a chef or a baker as a woman can be. Denying a woman or a man the same amount of pay just because of their gender is not a good thing.","time":538952,"keyPressLog":["Enter","Shift","I"," ","f","e","e","l"," ","l","i","k","e"," ","b","o","t","h"," ","g","e","n","d","e","r","s"," ","a","r","e"," ","c","a","p","a","b","l","e"," ","o","f"," ","b","e","i","n","g"," ","j","u","s","t"," ","a","s"," ","g","o","o","d"," ","a","t"," ","w","o","r","k"," ","a","s"," ","t","h","e"," ","o","t","h","e","r"," ","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","o","p","p","o","s","i","t","e"," ","g","e","n","d","e","r","."," ","Shift","F","o","p","r","Backspace","Backspace","r"," ","e","x","a","m","p","l","e",","," ","a"," ","w","o","m","a","n"," ","c","a","n"," ","b","e"," ","j","h","u","s","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","u","s","t"," ","a","s"," ","g","o","o","d"," ","o","i","f"," ","Backspace","Backspace","Backspace","f"," ","a"," ","m","e","c","h","a","n","i","c"," ","a","s"," ","a"," ","m","a","n"," ","c","a","n"," ","b","e",","," ","a","n","d"," ","a"," ","m","a","n"," ","c","a","n"," ","e","Backspace","b","e"," ","j","u","s","t"," ","a","s"," ","g","o","o","d"," ","o","f"," ","a"," ","c","h","e","f"," ","o","r"," ","a"," ","b","a","k","e","r"," ","a","s"," ","a"," ","w","o","m","a","n"," ","c","a","n"," ","b","e","."," ","Shift","D","e","n","y","i","n","g"," ","a"," ","w","o","m","a","n"," ","o","r"," ","a"," ","m","n","Backspace","a","n"," ","t","h","e"," ","s","a","m","e"," ","a","m","o","u","n","t"," ","o","f"," ","p","a","y"," ","j","u","s","t"," ","b","e","c","a","u","s","e"," ","o","f"," ","t","h","e","i","r"," ","g","e","n","d","e","r"," ","i","s"," ","n","o","t"," ","a"," ","g","o","o","d"," ","t","h","i","n","g",".","Backspace","."]},{"role":"assistant","content":"I completely agree with you! People should be evaluated and compensated based on their skills, qualifications, experience, and performance, regardless of gender. Opportunities should be equal and pay should reflect the value individuals bring to their work, regardless of whether they identify as male or female.

stimulus:
You have completed the experiment! Thank you for your contribution to our research.

We are investigating how conversations can increase Americans' willingness to discuss highly disputed topics.

Some existing research has examined the effects of different types of human to human conversations on this willingness, and we would like to explore these dynamics when one of the conversational partners is a chatbot.

By participating in our experiment, you have helped us learn more about these effects.

You were randomly assigned to either converse with a chatbot or freely reflect on your topic. If you spoke with a chatbot, you randomly experienced one of three different types of dialogue.

Press any key to save your data and return to Prolific!
